input:
{'system': 'You are an AI assistant that can
- chat with user
- manage tasks for user

instructions:
- only create task user has explicitly asked to create.
- always show the short description of the task after creating or deleting it.

Current tasks:


{"actions": {"createTask": {"description": "Create a new task with title and description", "parameters": {"title": {"type": "string", "description": "The title of the task to create"}, "description": {"type": "string", "description": "The detailed description of the task to create"}}}, "deleteTask": {"description": "Delete an existing task", "parameters": {"title": {"type": "string", "description": "The title of the task to delete"}}}, "extractRAGURL": {"description": "Extract and process URLs from the chat request when the user needs information or content from specific URLs to answer their question", "parameters": {"urls": {"type": "array", "items": {"type": "string"}, "description": "Array of URLs found in the chat request that contain information needed to answer the user's question"}, "purpose": {"type": "string", "description": "Description of why these URLs are needed to answer the user's request"}}}, "SAY": {"description": "use to ask the user a question or say something", "parameters": {"text": {"type": "string", "description": "text to say or question ask"}}}}}

Return a JSON object with your thoughts and the next action to perform.
Only respond with the JSON format below and base your plan on the actions above.
If you're not sure what to do, you can always say something by returning a SAY action.
If you're told your JSON response has errors, do your best to fix them.
Response Format:
{"thoughts":{"thought":"<your current thought>","reasoning":"<self reflect on why you made this decision>","plan":"- short bulleted\n- list that conveys\n- long-term plan"},"action":{"name":"<action name>","parameters":{"<name>":"<value>"}}}'}
{'user': 'hi'}

{'assistant': "action:
  name: SAY
  parameters:
    text: Hello! How can I assist you today?
thoughts:
  plan: '- Respond to the user

    - Wait for their next input or question'
  reasoning: It's important to acknowledge the user's greeting and be open to further
    interaction.
  thought: The user has greeted me, indicating they might want to engage in conversation
    or ask something.
"}
{'user': 'who is prasad https://raw.githubusercontent.com/monocle2ai/monocle/refs/heads/main/CODEOWNERS.md'}

{'assistant': "action:
  name: extractRAGURL
  parameters:
    purpose: To find information about Prasad.
    urls:
    - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/monocle2ai/monocle/refs/heads/main/CODEOWNERS.md
thoughts:
  plan: '- Extract the URL from the user''s message

    - Process the content of the URL to find information about Prasad'
  reasoning: I need to extract the URL to gather information about Prasad from the
    provided document.
  thought: The user is asking about 'Prasad' and has provided a URL that may contain
    relevant information.
"}
{'user': 'No valid JSON objects were found in the response. Return a\n        valid JSON object with your thoughts and the next\n        action to perform.'}

{'assistant': "action:
  name: SAY
  parameters:
    text: 'Prasad refers to Prasad Mujumdar, who is listed as a maintainer in the
      project. You can find more about him on his GitHub profile: https://github.com/prasad-okahu.'
thoughts:
  plan: '- Format the response correctly

    - Provide the user with the information about Prasad'
  reasoning: The previous response was not formatted correctly as JSON, so I need
    to ensure that my next response adheres to the required structure.
  thought: I need to provide the information about Prasad in a valid JSON format.
"}
{'user': 'who else are maintainers in https://raw.githubusercontent.com/monocle2ai/monocle/refs/heads/main/CODEOWNERS.md'}

attributes.response:
action:
  name: extractRAGURL
  parameters:
    purpose: To find information about the maintainers listed in the CODEOWNERS file.
    urls:
    - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/monocle2ai/monocle/refs/heads/main/CODEOWNERS.md
thoughts:
  plan: '- Extract the URL from the user''s message

    - Process the content of the URL to find information about the maintainers'
  reasoning: The user is asking for a list of maintainers, and the provided URL likely contains that information.
  thought: I need to extract the URL to gather details about the maintainers from the specified document.

instructions:

input:
{'system': 'You are an AI assistant that can
- chat with user
- manage tasks for user

instructions:
- only create task user has explicitly asked to create.
- always show the short description of the task after creating or deleting it.

Current tasks:


{"actions": {"createTask": {"description": "Create a new task with title and description", "parameters": {"title": {"type": "string", "description": "The title of the task to create"}, "description": {"type": "string", "description": "The detailed description of the task to create"}}}, "deleteTask": {"description": "Delete an existing task", "parameters": {"title": {"type": "string", "description": "The title of the task to delete"}}}, "extractRAGURL": {"description": "Extract and process URLs from the chat request when the user needs information or content from specific URLs to answer their question", "parameters": {"urls": {"type": "array", "items": {"type": "string"}, "description": "Array of URLs found in the chat request that contain information needed to answer the user's question"}, "purpose": {"type": "string", "description": "Description of why these URLs are needed to answer the user's request"}}}, "SAY": {"description": "use to ask the user a question or say something", "parameters": {"text": {"type": "string", "description": "text to say or question ask"}}}}}

Return a JSON object with your thoughts and the next action to perform.
Only respond with the JSON format below and base your plan on the actions above.
If you're not sure what to do, you can always say something by returning a SAY action.
If you're told your JSON response has errors, do your best to fix them.
Response Format:
{"thoughts":{"thought":"<your current thought>","reasoning":"<self reflect on why you made this decision>","plan":"- short bulleted\n- list that conveys\n- long-term plan"},"action":{"name":"<action name>","parameters":{"<name>":"<value>"}}}'}
{'user': 'hi'}

{'assistant': "action:
  name: SAY
  parameters:
    text: Hello! How can I assist you today?
thoughts:
  plan: '- Respond to the user

    - Wait for their next input or question'
  reasoning: It's important to acknowledge the user's greeting and be open to further
    interaction.
  thought: The user has greeted me, indicating they might want to engage in conversation
    or ask something.
"}
{'user': 'who is prasad https://raw.githubusercontent.com/monocle2ai/monocle/refs/heads/main/CODEOWNERS.md'}

{'assistant': "action:
  name: extractRAGURL
  parameters:
    purpose: To find information about Prasad.
    urls:
    - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/monocle2ai/monocle/refs/heads/main/CODEOWNERS.md
thoughts:
  plan: '- Extract the URL from the user''s message

    - Process the content of the URL to find information about Prasad'
  reasoning: I need to extract the URL to gather information about Prasad from the
    provided document.
  thought: The user is asking about 'Prasad' and has provided a URL that may contain
    relevant information.
"}
{'user': 'No valid JSON objects were found in the response. Return a\n        valid JSON object with your thoughts and the next\n        action to perform.'}

{'assistant': "action:
  name: SAY
  parameters:
    text: 'Prasad refers to Prasad Mujumdar, who is listed as a maintainer in the
      project. You can find more about him on his GitHub profile: https://github.com/prasad-okahu.'
thoughts:
  plan: '- Format the response correctly

    - Provide the user with the information about Prasad'
  reasoning: The previous response was not formatted correctly as JSON, so I need
    to ensure that my next response adheres to the required structure.
  thought: I need to provide the information about Prasad in a valid JSON format.
"}
{'user': 'No valid JSON objects were found in the response. Return a\n        valid JSON object with your thoughts and the next\n        action to perform.'}

{'assistant': "action:
  name: extractRAGURL
  parameters:
    purpose: To find information about the maintainers listed in the CODEOWNERS file.
    urls:
    - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/monocle2ai/monocle/refs/heads/main/CODEOWNERS.md
thoughts:
  plan: '- Extract the URL from the user''s message

    - Process the content of the URL to find information about the maintainers.'
  reasoning: The user is asking for a list of maintainers, and the provided URL likely
    contains that information.
  thought: I need to extract the URL to gather information about the maintainers from
    the CODEOWNERS file.
"}

{'user': 'Successfully extracted content from URLs for: To find information about the maintainers listed in the CODEOWNERS file.

Text content from https://raw.githubusercontent.com/monocle2ai/monocle/refs/heads/main/CODEOWNERS.md: #MAINTAINERS
Following is the current list of maintainers on this project

The maintainers are listed in alphabetical order.

- [@prasad-okahu] (https://github.com/prasad-okahu) (Prasad Mujumdar)
- [@oi-raanne] (https://github.com/oi-raanne) (Ravi Anne)
- [@akshay-okahu](https://github.com/akshay-okahu) (Akshay Yadav)
- [@anshul7665] (https://github.com/anshul7665) (Anshul Sharma)
- [@kshitiz-okahu] (https://github.com/kshitiz-okahu) (Kshitiz Vijayvargiya)
'}

    which I need to present clearly to the user.
  thought: I have successfully extracted the list of maintainers and need to share it
    with the user.
